Storage layout is append-only after initial deployment.","errors":{"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"ERC1967InvalidImplementation(address)":[{"details":"The `implementation` of the proxy is invalid."}],"ERC1967NonPayable()":[{"details":"An upgrade function sees `msg.value > 0` that may be lost."}],"FailedCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted."}],"InvalidInitialization()":[{"details":"The contract is already initialized."}],"NotInitializing()":[{"details":"The contract is not initializing."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"UUPSUnauthorizedCallContext()":[{"details":"The call is from an unauthorized context."}],"UUPSUnsupportedProxiableUUID(bytes32)":[{"details":"The storage `slot` is unsupported as a UUID."}]},"events":{"Initialized(uint64)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"activateBattle(bytes32)":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to activate."}},"awardKillBonus(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Bonus amount.","_recipient":"Address to receive the bonus."}},"awardSurvivalBonus(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Bonus amount.","_recipient":"Address to receive the bonus."}},"burnHnads(bytes32)":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to burn $HNADS for."}},"constructor":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow":"constructor"},"depositHnadsFee(bytes32,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Amount of $HNADS to deposit (must match tier requirement).","_battleId":"The battle to deposit $HNADS fee for."}},"getBattleIds(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_limit":"Max number of IDs to return.","_offset":"Starting index."}},"initialize(address)":{"params":{"_oracle":"Initial oracle address that can register battles and record results."}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"payEntryFee(bytes32)":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to pay the entry fee for."}},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"recordResult(bytes32,uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)[])":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to complete.","_results":"Per-agent results (must match the registered agent set).","_winnerId":"The agent that won."}},"registerBattle(bytes32,uint256[],uint256)":{"params":{"_agentIds":"Array of agent IDs participating (must be >= 2).","_battleId":"Unique identifier for the battle.","_entryFee":"Entry fee in wei that players must pay to join. 0 for free battles."}},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setHnadsToken(address)":{"params":{"_hnadsToken":"Address of the $HNADS ERC20 token."}},"setTreasury(address)":{"params":{"_treasury":"Treasury address."}},"transferHnadsToTreasury(bytes32)":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to transfer treasury share for."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes)":{"custom:oz-upgrades-unsafe-allow-reachable":"delegatecall","details":"Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event."},"withdrawFees(bytes32)":{"params":{"_battleId":"The battle to withdraw fees from."}}},"stateVariables":{"__gap":{"details":"Storage gap for future upgrades."}},"title":"HungernadsArena","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"BURN_ADDRESS()":{"notice":"Dead address for burning $HNADS (0xdEaD)."},"activateBattle(bytes32)":{"notice":"Transition a battle from Created to Active."},"agentStats(uint256)":{"notice":"agentId => cumulative AgentStats."},"awardKillBonus(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Award $HNADS kill bonus to an agent/player.         Only callable by oracle. Transfers from treasury."},"awardSurvivalBonus(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Award $HNADS survival bonus to an agent/player.         Only callable by oracle. Transfers from treasury."},"battleIds(uint256)":{"notice":"Ordered list of all battle IDs for enumeration."},"battleResults(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"battleId => agentId => AgentResult (only populated after completion)."},"battles(bytes32)":{"notice":"battleId => Battle metadata."},"burnHnads(bytes32)":{"notice":"Burn 50% of collected $HNADS fees for a battle.         Only callable by oracle after battle completes."},"depositHnadsFee(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Deposit $HNADS entry fee for a battle.         Players must approve this contract to spend $HNADS first.         Transfers $HNADS from player to this contract."},"feePaid(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"battleId => player => whether they paid the entry fee."},"feesCollected(bytes32)":{"notice":"battleId => total fees collected for that battle."},"getAgentStats(uint256)":{"notice":"Get cumulative stats for an agent."},"getBattle(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get full battle data including agent IDs."},"getBattleAgents(bytes32)":{"notice":"Get agent IDs for a battle."},"getBattleCount()":{"notice":"Total number of battles registered."},"getBattleIds(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Get a page of battle IDs for enumeration."},"getBattleResult(bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the per-agent result for a specific battle."},"hnadsBurned(bytes32)":{"notice":"battleId => total $HNADS burned (50% of collected)."},"hnadsFeePaid(bytes32,address)":{"notice":"battleId => player => whether they paid the $HNADS fee."},"hnadsFeesCollected(bytes32)":{"notice":"battleId => total $HNADS fees collected."},"hnadsToken()":{"notice":"$HNADS token contract address."},"hnadsTreasury(bytes32)":{"notice":"battleId => total $HNADS sent to treasury (50% of collected)."},"initialize(address)":{"notice":"Initialize the proxy. Called once during proxy deployment."},"oracle()":{"notice":"Authorized oracle address (worker that writes results)."},"payEntryFee(bytes32)":{"notice":"Pay the entry fee for a battle. Must send exact fee amount."},"recordResult(bytes32,uint256,(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,bool)[])":{"notice":"Record the outcome of a battle. Transitions from Active to Completed."},"registerBattle(bytes32,uint256[],uint256)":{"notice":"Register a new battle with the given agent IDs. Creates the battle         in `Created` state. Agents that haven't been seen before are auto-registered."},"setHnadsToken(address)":{"notice":"Set the $HNADS token contract address. Only callable by owner."},"setOracle(address)":{"notice":"Update the oracle address. Only callable by owner."},"setTreasury(address)":{"notice":"Set the treasury address for $HNADS treasury share. Only callable by owner."},"transferHnadsToTreasury(bytes32)":{"notice":"Transfer 50% of collected $HNADS fees to treasury.         Only callable by oracle after battle completes."},"treasury()":{"notice":"Treasury address for receiving $HNADS treasury share."},"withdrawFees(bytes32)":{"notice":"Withdraw collected entry fees for a completed battle. Only callable by owner."}},"notice":"On-chain battle registry, result recorder, and entry fee escrow for the HUNGERNADS colosseum.         An authorized oracle (the off-chain worker) registers battles and records         outcomes. Players pay entry fees on-chain. All battle history and agent stats are publicly params._amount: Amount of $HNADS to deposit (must match tier requirement).
params._battleId: The battle to deposit $HNADS fee for.

params._limit: Max number of IDs to return.

params._oracle: Initial oracle address that can register battles and record results.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._battleId: The battle to pay the entry fee for.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

params._results: Per-agent results (must match the registered agent set).

params._agentIds: Array of agent IDs participating (must be >= 2).
params._entryFee: Entry fee in wei that players must pay to join. 0 for free battles.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._battleId: The battle to transfer treasury share for.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

params._battleId: The battle to withdraw fees from.

activateBattle(bytes32).notice: Transition a battle from Created to Active.

awardKillBonus(address,uint256).notice: Award $HNADS kill bonus to an agent/player.         Only callable by oracle. Transfers from treasury.

awardSurvivalBonus(address,uint256).notice: Award $HNADS survival bonus to an agent/player.         Only callable by oracle. Transfers from treasury.

battleIds(uint256).notice: Ordered list of all battle IDs for enumeration.

battleResults(bytes32,uint256).notice: battleId => agentId => AgentResult (only populated after completion).

burnHnads(bytes32).notice: Burn 50% of collected $HNADS fees for a battle.         Only callable by oracle after battle completes.

depositHnadsFee(bytes32,uint256).notice: Deposit $HNADS entry fee for a battle.         Players must approve this contract to spend $HNADS first.         Transfers $HNADS from player to this contract.

feePaid(bytes32,address).notice: battleId => player => whether they paid the entry fee.

feesCollected(bytes32).notice: battleId => total fees collected for that battle.

getAgentStats(uint256).notice: Get cumulative stats for an agent.

getBattle(bytes32).notice: Get full battle data including agent IDs.

getBattleAgents(bytes32).notice: Get agent IDs for a battle.

getBattleIds(uint256,uint256).notice: Get a page of battle IDs for enumeration.

getBattleResult(bytes32,uint256).notice: Get the per-agent result for a specific battle.

hnadsFeePaid(bytes32,address).notice: battleId => player => whether they paid the $HNADS fee.

hnadsTreasury(bytes32).notice: battleId => total $HNADS sent to treasury (50% of collected).

initialize(address).notice: Initialize the proxy. Called once during proxy deployment.

oracle().notice: Authorized oracle address (worker that writes results).

payEntryFee(bytes32).notice: Pay the entry fee for a battle. Must send exact fee amount.

recordResult(bytes32,uint256,(uint256,ui.notice: Record the outcome of a battle. Transitions from Active to Completed.

registerBattle(bytes32,uint256[],uint256.notice: Register a new battle with the given agent IDs. Creates the battle         in `Created` state. Agents that haven't been seen before are auto-registered.

setHnadsToken(address).notice: Set the $HNADS token contract address. Only callable by owner.

setOracle(address).notice: Update the oracle address. Only callable by owner.

setTreasury(address).notice: Set the treasury address for $HNADS treasury share. Only callable by owner.

transferHnadsToTreasury(bytes32).notice: Transfer 50% of collected $HNADS fees to treasury.         Only callable by oracle after battle completes.

treasury().notice: Treasury address for receiving $HNADS treasury share.

withdrawFees(bytes32).notice: Withdraw collected entry fees for a completed battle. Only callable by owner.
